meanings.definition: The measurement from base to top.
meanings.sent1: The heights of the tree were impressive.
meanings.sent2: She climbed to the heights of the mountain.
meanings.sent3: The cat reached the heights of the bookshelf effortlessly.
meanings.sent4: His ambition soared to new heights after the promotion.
meanings.sent5: The skyscraper's heights seemed to touch the clouds.

meanings.sent1: The playground is located at the heights of the park.
meanings.sent2: The eagle soared in the heights of the sky.
meanings.sent3: The picnic at the heights of the hill was delightful.
meanings.sent4: Her spirits lifted to new heights at the concert.
meanings.sent5: The castle stood proudly at the heights of the cliff.

meanings.sent1: The heights of her excitement were unmatched.
meanings.sent2: He reached the heights of success in his career.
meanings.sent3: The cake decorator's skill reached new heights with each creation.
meanings.sent4: The tension in the room rose to dangerous heights.
meanings.sent5: The singer's voice reached incredible heights during the performance.
